articles.author: Lisa Rowan on Two Cents, shared by Lisa Rowan to Lifehacker
articles.title: Invest in Crypto Stocks Instead of Actual Cryptocurrency
articles.description: Just a few short years ago, buying up cryptocurrency was all the rage. In theory, you could spend a little on Bitcoin or one of the other popular cryptocurrencies, and cash out with an astonishing rate of return.
articles.content:

articles.title: Bitcoin's Carbon Footprint May Not Be As Massive As Previously Estimated

articles.author: Jennings Brown
articles.title: Ring User Blocks $400K Bitcoin Extortion Attempt by Taking Out the Batteries
articles.description: Tania Amador of Grand Prairie, Texas, awoke on Monday to an alarm and a sinister voice speaking to her through her Ring device. Read more...
articles.content:
Tania Amador of Grand Prairie, Texas, awoke on Monday to an alarm and a sinister voice speaking to her through her Ring device. 
This is Ring support, the voice said, laughing.
 Then the hacker got to business. We would like to notify you that your account … [+2562 chars]

articles.title: Why is Bitcoin Soaring?

articles.author: Adriana Barrera
articles.title: Hackers demand $5 million from Mexico's Pemex in cyberattack
articles.description: Hackers demanded about $5 million in bitcoin from Mexico's Pemex, they told Reuters on Tuesday, saying the state oil firm missed a special discount by not paying immediately after a cyberattack that fouled up the company's systems.
